trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Lilburn
There were no other sightings in Lilburn on or around April 6th 2013
Summary: Steady star like object moving east and up. No FAA Red and Blues Lights
divs: Sighting DetailsTo the north I heard a helicopter approaching at the same time I witnessed a single star light move up over my house to the east, higher and higher and then over the cloud it went out of sight. Brilliant star light the whole time. No FAA blue and red flashers. It looked like the helicopter was following because it tilted forward a bit to pick up some speed. Anybody east of Lilburn see a single star light object about that time?
